sentences.sContent: To rise thither with my inebriate Soul!
sentences.sContent_eng: To rise thither with my inebriate Soul!
sentences.sCn: 带着我的酒醉的灵魂向那里飞腾！

sentences.sContent: That evening, The boy drank much wine but he didn't inebriate, therefore didn't become careless.
sentences.sContent_eng: That evening, The boy drank much wine but he didn't inebriate, therefore didn't become careless.
sentences.sCn: 那天晚上，男孩饮了许多酒但他没有醉，并没有因此而变得糊涂。

synos.tran: 酒醉的；醉醺醺的；陶醉的

remMethod.val: in (使) + ebri (醉) + ate → 使醉 → 灌醉

trans.tranCn: 酒醉的；醉醺醺的；陶醉的

trans.tranOther: a person who is drunk, esp habitually
